content.question: The demand curve for labor shows which of the following?

choices.label: The quantity of output each worker can produce at various wage rates
The number of workers required to produce a given level of output
The number of workers a firm is willing and able to hire at various wage rates
The positive relationship between the wage rate and the number of hours people wish to work
The number of workers who are willing and able to work at various wage rates

content.answer: The number of workers a firm is willing and able to hire at various wage rates

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
